page.title: 17RECREATION
page.content: The most popular provision is for the sport of soccer with about 15 grounds in the area. Most noticeable are Wishaw Juniors FC{(GR.803552)}and Coltness United{(GR.820555). { }There are two private bowling clubs in the area, Holdsworth Bowling Club {(GR.803551)}and Newmains Bowling Club {(GR.819556).}Bowling is a very popular sport in this area for all ages. There is little provision for indoor sports in this area. These are Badminton (Cambusnethan North Ch.), Coltness Volleyball Club (Coltness High Sch. & Wishaw Sports Centre- outwith our area to the SW), Karate in Cambusnethan Community Hall and Judo in St Aidain's Primary. Indeed most of the indoor recreation needs is catered for by the Wishaw Sports Centre opened in 1981.
